Welcome to the K-pop Club


The K-pop Club is a vibrant community that makes dance accessible, builds confidence, and brings people together through music, creativity, and performance.

Welcome to the Club

The K-pop Club is a vibrant community that makes dance accessible, builds confidence, and brings people together through music, creativity, and performance.

Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned dancer, you’re welcome here.

Join Us Today

Special Thanks

Content section 2.14

What We Do


We host exciting dance shows, weekly podcast episodes, and interactive workshops throughout the year.

Why Join Us?


Make friends, learn choreography, and build teamwork & confidence.

Our Mission


To celebrate K-pop, empower students, and share creativity across campus.

Do I need dance experience?


Nope — beginners are welcome!

What should I bring?


Comfy clothes, water, and a positive attitude.

Can I just watch?


Absolutely — spectators are encouraged.

How often do we meet?


Weekly practices + monthly events.

Member Perks

H4 Card

Learn choreography step-by-step
